ALLEVENTTOUSERPROPERTIESACTION_NAME_LABE: copy all event properties to user properties
ALLEVENTTOUSERPROPERTIESACTION_DESCRIPTI: Copies all event properties directly to user properties
EVALUATEUSERSEGMENTSACTION_DESCRIPTION_L: Calculates the segments that the current user belongs to
EVENTTOUSERPROPERTYACTION_NAME_LABEL: copy event property to user property
EVENTTOUSERPROPERTYACTION_DESCRIPTION_LA: Copies an event property to a user property
SETPROPERTYACTION_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Sets user property to a predefined value
EVENTPROPERTYNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_: The name of the event property to read
USERPROPERTYNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_L: The name of the user property to write
SETPROPERTYNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LA: The name of the user property to set
SETPROPERTYVALUE_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_L: The value of the user property to set
SESSIONCREATEDEVENTCONDITION_DESCRIPTION: A user session has been created
USERPROPERTYCONDITION_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: A condition on a user property
USERSEGMENTCONDITION_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The user is in a segment
USERUPDATEDEVENTCONDITION_DESCRIPTION_LA: A user profile has been updated
SUBCONDITIONS_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABE: Sub conditions that will be evaluated using the operator
PAGEURL_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The URL of the page that has been viewed
PROPERTYNAME_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The name of the user property to match
COMPARISONOPERATOR_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: The operator to use for the user property comparison
PROPERTYVALUE_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABE: The value of the user property to match
MATCHTYPE_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The type of matching to perform against the segments
DRAG_AND_DROP_CONDITION_LABEL: Drag and drop a new condition here
